About

Jeremy Tinianow is a cross-disciplinary designer with a focus on bridging the gap between digital and physical. Currently a student at Boulder Digital Works.

Based in sunny Denver, CO and always on the lookout for new opportunities & challenges in the borderlands between design and technology.
